LanguageData.GoJuiceAddiction.label: go-juice addiction
LanguageData.GoJuiceAddiction.description: A chemical addiction to go-juice. Long-term presence of go-juice has caused neurological adaptations at the cellular level, so the brain can no longer function properly without the drug.\n\nWithout regular doses of go-juice, withdrawal symptoms will begin. However, extended abstinence will force the brain to adapt back to its normal state, resolving the addiction.
LanguageData.GoJuiceAddiction.stages.withdrawal.label: withdrawal
LanguageData.GoJuiceHigh.label: high on go-juice
LanguageData.GoJuiceHigh.description: Go-Juice in the bloodstream. It supercharges combat-related abilities.
LanguageData.GoJuiceTolerance.label: go-juice tolerance
LanguageData.GoJuiceTolerance.description: A built-up tolerance to go-juice. The more severe this tolerance is, the more go-juice it takes to get the same effect.
LanguageData.GoJuiceTolerance.stages.small-0.label: small
LanguageData.GoJuiceTolerance.stages.small-1.label: small
LanguageData.GoJuiceTolerance.stages.large.label: large
LanguageData.GoJuiceTolerance.stages.massive.label: massive
